statement._text: Find a priest who fled to a desert oasis, as he has information on the young prince of Levant’s murder.
Find a priest who fled to a desert oasis, as he has information on the young prince of Levant’s murder.
Find a clue inside the small hive in the south of Abrassar, close to the larger hive.

Found a clue in the hive. Find another clue in the burial grounds west of Berg, in the Enmerkar Forest.

Found a clue in the fort in the south of Enmerkar. The next clue should be somewhere within the slums of Levant.

The people of the slums gave me a Clue. They also suggest checking in the small hive south of Abrassar, if I had not done this already.
Talk to Cyrene, in the city of Levant, in the Abrassar desert.

Find Prince Pietro in the smugglers’ tunnels under Levant.

Talk to Queen Calixa, in Levant, for a reward.
